name: Visa and Stay Authorization for Studies
description: We provide comprehensive advisory services for obtaining a visa and stay authorization for studies in Spain. This service is aimed at students wishing to pursue higher education, post-compulsory secondary education, student mobility programs, volunteer work, or training activities at recognized institutions. We assist throughout the process, from document collection to application submission.

required_documents: Admission letter from the educational institution

benefits:
Personalized advice
Comprehensive process management
High success rate
Up-to-date knowledge of regulations
Time and effort saving
Continuous support during the process
target_audience: Foreign students of legal age applying for a residence authorization, or over 17 years old when applying for a student visa.
